column1: atIte ऽdhvany asaGgam apratihataM jJAnadarzanaM pravartate
anAgate ऽdhvany asaGgam apratihataM jJAnadarzanaM pravartate
pratyutpanne ऽdhvany asaGgam apratihatam jJAnadarzanaM pravartate
nairAtmyAH sarva dharmAH sattvAz ca nairAtmyaM nAdhimucyante. atas tathAgatasya sattveSu mahAkaruNotpadyate
anyonyavivAdasaMgRhIto vatAyaM lokasaMnivezo vyapAdakhiladveSapratipanna iti saMpazyan
lubdho lobhAbhibhUto vatAyaM lokasaMnivezo ऽtRptaH paravittApahArI
atRptA vateme sattvA lAbhasatkArazlokopacaritAs tRptAH sma iti pratijAnante
nityAbhiratA vateme sattvA ekAntakliSTA duHkhabhAjane gRhAvAse

idaM punar agram asaGga jJAnam utsRjya viziSTaparinirvANatAm sattvA hInayAnaM prArthayante yad idam zrAvakapratyekabuddhayAnaM tebhya uttaramatiM rocayisyAmItI yad idaM buddhajJAnAdhyAlambanatAyai iti tathAgatasya sattveSu mahAkaruNopadyate
yathA samAhite citte svIya Asane ऽntarhitaH
udake ऽpy abhidyamAno gacchati tad yathApi nAma mahApRthivyAm
dhUmayaty api prajvalaty api tad yathApI nAma mahAn agniskandhaH
svakAyAd api mahAvAridhArA utsRjati tad yathApi nAma mahAmeghaH
yAbhir vAridhArAbhir ayaM trisAhasramahAsAhRsro lokadhAturAdIptah pradiptah saMprajvalito ऽgninA ekajvalIbhuto nirvApyate
imAvapi candrasUryau evammaharddhikau evaM mahAnubhAvau evaM mahaujaskau pANinA parAmRSati parimArjayati
yAvad brahmalokAd api sattvAn kAyena vaze vartayati
sAkAram soddezaM sanidAnaM pUrvanivAsam anusmarati sma
jAtismaraH amutrAham Asam evaM nAmA evaM jAtIH evaM gotraH evam AhAraH evaM sukhaduHkhapratisaMvedI evaM cirasthitikaH evaM AyuSparyantaH tataz cyuto ऽmutropapannaH tataz cyuta ihApy upapannaH
na punar bodhisattvo mahAsattvaH kAmaguNair lipyate
te ca bodhisattvA mahAsattvA bhUyastena sarve kumArabhUtAH

viviktaM kAmair viviktaM pApAkair akuzaladharmaiH savitarkaM savicAraM vivekajaM prItisukhaM prathamaM dhyAnam upasaMpadya viharati
sa vitarkavicArANAM vyupazamAd adhyAtmaM samprasAdAc cetasa ekotIbhAvAd avitarkam avicAraM samAdhijaM prItisukhaM dvitIyaM dhyAnam upasaMpadya viharati
sa prIter virAgAd upekSako viharati smRtaH saMprajAnan sukhaM ca kAyena pratisaMvedayati yattad AryA AcakSate upekSakaH smRtimAn sukhaM viharatIti niSprItikaM tRtIyaM dhyAnam upasampadya viharati
sa sukhasya ca prahANAd duHkhasya ca prahANAt pUrvam eva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaMgamAd aduHkhAsukham upekSAsmRtiparizuddhaM caturthaM dhyAnam upasaMpadya viharati
sa sarvazo rUpasaMjJAnAM samatikramAt pratighasaMjJAnAm astaMgamAn nAnAtvasaMjJAnAm amanasikArAd anantam AkAzam ity AkAzAnantyAyatanam upasaMpadya viharati
sa sarvaza AkAzAnanty AyatanaM samatikramyAnantaM vijJAnam iti vijJAnAnanty Ayatanam upasaMpadya viharati
sa sarvazo vijJAnAnantyAyatanaM samatikramya nAsti kiMcid ityAkiMcanyAyatanam upasaMpadya viharati
sa sarvazo AkiMcanyAyatanaM samatikramya naivasaMjJAnAsaMjJAyatanam upasampadya viharati
sa maitrIsahagatena cittenAvaireNAsapatnenAvyAbAdhena vipulena mahadgatenApramANenAdvayena subhAvitenaikAM dizam adhimucya sphAritvopasaMpadya viharati
tathA dvitIyaM tathA tritIyaM tatha caturtham ity Urdhvam adhas tiryak sarvazaH sarvAvantam imaM lokam
rUpI rUpANi pazyaty ayaM prathamo vimokSaH
adhyAtmam arUpasaMjJI bahirdhA rUpANi pazyaty ayaM dvitIyo vimokSaH
sa sarvazo rUpasaNjJAnAM samatikramAt pratigha [prathama]saJjGAnAm astaMgamAn nAnA tvasaMjJAnAm amanasikArAd anantam AkAzam ityAkAzAnantyAyatanam upsampadya viharaty ayaM caturtho vimokSaH
sa sarvaza AkiMcanyAyatanaM samatikramya naivasaMjJAnAsaMjJAyatanam upasampadya viharaty ayaM saptamo vimokSaH
adhyAtmarUpasaMjJI bahirdhA rUpANi pazyati parIttAni suvarNadurvarNAni tAni khalu rUpANy abhibhUya jAnAty abhibhUya pazyati evaMsaMjJi ca bhavati idaM prathamam abhibhvAyatanaM
adhyAtmam arUpasaMjJI bahirdhA rUpANi pazyati mahadgatAni suvarNadurvarNAni tAni khalu rUpANy abhibhUya jAnAty abhibhUya pazyati evaMsaMjJI ca bhavati idaM dvitIyam abhibhvAyatanam

adhyAtmam arUpasaMjJI bahirdhA rUpANi pazyati nIlAni nIlavarNAni nIlanidarzanAni nIlanirbhAsAni tadyathA umakapuSpaM sampannaM vA vArANaseyaM vastraM nIlaM nIlavarNaM nIlanidarzanaM nIlanirbhAsam evam evAdhyAtmam arUpasaMjJI bahirdhA rUpANi pazyati nIlAni nilavarNAni nIlanidarzanAni nIlanirbhAsAni idaM tRtIyam abhibhvAyatanam

adhyAtman arUpasaMjJI bahirdhA rUpANi pazyati pItAni pItavarNAni pItanidarzanAni pItanirbhAsAni tadyathA karNikArapuSpaM saMpannam vA vArANaseyaM vastraM pItaM pItavarNaM pItanidarzanaM pItanirbhAsam evam evAdhyAtmam arUpasaMjJI bahirdhA rUpANi pazyati pIta varNAni pItanidarzanAni pItanirbhAsAni idaM caturtham abhibhvAyanam

adhyAtman arUpasaMjJI bahirdhA rUpANi pazyati lohitAni lohitavarNAni lohitanidarzanAni lohita nirbhAsAni tadyathA bandhujIvakapuSpaM saMpannaM vA vArANaseyaM vastraM lohitaM lohitavarNaM lohitanidarzanaM lohitanirbhAsaM evamevAdhyAtmam arUpasaMjJI bahirdhA rUpANi pazyati lohitAni lohitavarNAni lohitanidarzanAni lohitavarNAni lohitanidarzanAni lohitanirbhAsAni idaM paJcamam abhibhvAyatanam

adhyAtmam arUpasaMjJI bahirdhA rUpANi pazyati avadAtAni avadAtavarNAni avadAtanirbhAsAni tadyathA uzanastArakAvarNa avadAta avadAtavarNa avadAtanidarzana avadAtanirbhAsaH evam evAdhyAtmam arUpasaMjJI bahirdhA rUpANi pazyati avadAtani avadAtavarNAni avadAtanidarzanAni avadAtanirbhAsAni idaM SaSTam abhibhvAyatanam
sa sarvazo rUpasaMjJAnAM samatikramAt pratighasaMjJAnAm astaMgamAn nAnAtvasaMjJAnAm amanasikArAd anantam AkAzamity AkAzAnantyAyatanam upasaMpadya viharati idaM saptamam abhibhvAyatanam
sa sarvaza AkAzAnantyAyatanaM samatikramyAnantaM vijJAnam iti vijJAnAnantyAyatanam upasaMpadya viharati idam aSTamam abhibhvAyatanam
pRthivIkRtsnAm ityeke saMjAnate ityUrdhvam adhas tiryag advayam apramANam
aptejovAyunIlapItalohitAvadAtakRtsnAm ity eke saMjAnate ity Urdhvam adhas tiryagadvayam apramANam
yadapIcchayA paryeSamANo na labhate tad api duHkham
nAnAtvakAyA nAnAtvasaMjJinaH tadyathA manuSyA ekatyAzca devAH
nAnAtvakAyA ekatvasaMjJinas tadyathA devA brahmakAyikAH prathamAbhinirvRttAH
sa imAm eva samudraparyantAM mahApRthivIm akhilAm akaNTakAm anutpAtAm adaNDenAzastreNa dharmeNa samenAbhinirjityAdhyAvasati
bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathAgataH paraM maraNAt
naiva bhavati na na bhavatitathAgataH paraM maraNAt
na ca bhagavato mukhadvArasyomiJjitaM vA nimiJjitAM vA prajJAyate sma
roga spRSTA vigata rogA bhavanti sma
sa cet pRSTaH praznAvyAkaraNAya avakAzaM kuryAt
dena hi zRNu sAdhu ca suSThu ca manasikuru
bhagavAn imam evArthaM bhUyasyA mAtrayA abhidyotayamA gAthAbhigItena saMprakAzayati sma
yadi ca. bhagavAn AjJAsIt sadevakaM lokaM saMnipatitam
na zravaNapathm AgamiSyati. na zravaNapathamArgam iSyati
iti hi tallakSaNagaNanayA sumeruparvatarAjo lakSanikSepakriyayA parikSayaM
dvau vA trayo vA chadanaparyAyA dAtavyAH
na nAgazIrSakaM nivAsanaM nivAsayiSyAmIti zikSA karaNIyA
na odanena sUpikaM praticchAdayiSyAmaH sUpikena vA odanam
na sAmiSam udakam antargRhe chorayiSyAmaH santaM gRhiNam anavalokya
na taTe na prapAte na prAgbhAre pAtraM sthApayiSyAmaH
na nIcatarake niSaNNA uccatarake Asane niSaNnAyAglAnAya dharmaM dezayiSyAmaH
na pRSThato gacchantaH purato gacchate aglAnAya dharmaM dezayiSyAmaH
notpathena gacchantaH pathena gacchate aglAnAya dharmaM dezayiSyAmaH
nAglAnA udaka uccAraprasrAvaM kheTaM siGghANakaM vAntaM viriktaM cchorayiSyAmi
nAglAnAH saharitapRthivIpradeze uccAraprasrAvaM kheTaM siMghANakaM vAntaM viriktaM cchorayiSyAmaH
nasAdhikapauruSyaM vRkSam adhirokSyAma anyatrApada iti zikSA karaNIyA
